claim: The 1998 romantic comedy The Man in the Iron Mask starred Leonardo DiCaprio.

supporting.text: Leonardo DiCaprio was cast in 'The Man in the Iron Mask' as King Louis XIV and his twin brother, confirming his involvement in the film.
